author: TravisEz13
body: Due to the use of unsupported APIs, we must remove the LocalAccounts module until a better solution is found.

comments.author: bahuwang
comments.body: Is there a better solution now？

comments.author: ThomasNieto
comments.body:
The Windows built-in local accounts module works with Powershell. Here is the module compability reference pages: https://aka.ms/PSModuleCompat
PowerShell 7 module compatibility - PowerShell

title: Due to the use of unsupported APIs, we must remove the LocalAccounts module until a better solution is found.
